turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I'm looking to get some help ordering food from pizzeria Bella Luna. Can you help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: food from bella luna, yes i can help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizza would you like to order today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just looking for two small ones with thin crust, sausage on the one, pepperoni on the other.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small with thin crust, 1 with sausage and 1 with pepperoni is that your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, please. As fast as possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total comes to 24 dollars, shall we go ahead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. How long for till it's ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Go ahead and place the order, and I'll be on my way.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria.
